design_identity.core_philosophy: Controlled Clarity. Information is dense but never overwhelming. The UI feels like a modern, interactive medical atlas.
design_identity.archetype: Archetype 3 (Pastel & Soft) mixed with Archetype 4 (Swiss/High-Contrast) for data density.

rules: Use 'tracking-tight' for all headings larger than 24px.
Body text must have 'leading-relaxed' (1.625) for readability of dense medical content.

contrast_rules: Text on pastel backgrounds must be Dark Slate (900), never grey.
Interactive elements must have a contrast ratio of 3:1.

modes.reading_view: Fixed Left Sidebar (260px) + Main Content (Max-w-3xl centered) + Right TOC (Hidden on mobile)

customization_rules: Shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-md for floating elements. Avoid heavy shadows.
Borders: 1px solid border-slate-200. Crucial for the 'Swiss' look.
Inputs: bg-slate-50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:bg-white transition-all.

specific_components.Button: Pill shape for primary actions, ghost for navigation.
specific_components.Card: Flat, 1px border, white background. Header distinct from body.
specific_components.Badge: Pastel background + Dark text (e.g., bg-green-100 text-green-800).
specific_components.Table: Clean rows, no vertical borders, hover effect on rows.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Sidebar can have backdrop-blur-lg if overlapping.
visual_enhancers.gradients: No full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in Hero sections only.
visual_enhancers.textures: Use noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to reduce digital harshness.

feedback.loading: Skeleton loaders matching the layout structure.
feedback.error: Inline error messages + Shake animation on forms.

implementation_steps: 1. Setup Tailwind Theme: Add 'Plus Jakarta Sans' and 'IBM Plex Sans' to fontFamily. Define 'Sage' as primary color.
2. Create Layout Shell: Sidebar (Collapsible), Top Header (Search + User), Main Content Area.
3. Build Auth Pages: Login/Register with split layout (Image Left, Form Right).
4. Develop Dashboard: 'Bento' grid for 'Recently Viewed', 'Bookmarks', 'New Diseases'.
5. Create Disease Detail Template: Header (Title + Tags), Content (Markdown/Rich Text), Right Sidebar (Quick Facts/TOC).
6. Build Admin Panel: Table views for Users/Diseases, WYSIWYG editor integration.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
